annotations:
TO:Chartering dept 
Attn:whom it may concern

Pls pps suitable biz for our lady and add wl@fz-highton.com in your address book，and pls contact me on WeChat(id:levinwl) or skype:wanglei5630@outlook.com 

MV  XIN HAI TONG  29  2011 BLT  57297.05 DWT  4X30 MT CRANE WL OPEN JORF LASFAR O/A 29TH AUG - 2ND SEP 2024 IAGW WP.
BOD: ABT 350- 450 MT FOR VLSFO AND ABT 100-150 MT FOR LSMGO.
TRY ALL DIRECTION.

1. NAME: MV XIN HAI TONG 29

2. TYPE: GEARED, SINGLE DECK BULK CARRIER

3. BUILT: 2011

4. FLAG: PANAMA

5. GRT/NRT INTERNATIONAL: 33,226 / 19,294

6. LOA / LBP / BEAM / DEPTH MOUDED: 190.00M / 183.30M / 32.26M / 18.50M

7. LOADING INFORMATION：

    LOADLINE DEADWEIGHT    DRAFT

    SUMMER:      57297.05       13.020 M

    WINTER:       55745.6        12.749M

    TROPICAL:     58850.9        13.291 M

    TPC AT SUMMER DRAFT: 57.3

8. CRANE/GRAB: 4 X 30 MT CRANES + 4X12CBM GRABS

9. H/H: 5/5

10. TYPE OF HATCH COVERS: FOLDING TYPE

11. GRAIN CAPACITY: 71987.9CBM

HOLD #1:      13624.9 CU. M

HOLD #2:      14,872.6 CU. M

HOLD #3:      14310.0 CU. M

HOLD #4:      14,884.9 CU. M

HOLD #5:      14295.5 CU. M

13. ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION IS GIVEN WITHOUT GUARANTEE: 

BALLAST: ABT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABT 22.0 MT VLSFO  + 0. 1MT LSMGO

LADEN:     ABT 11.5 KNOTS ON ABT 23.0 MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO

AT PORT:

IDLE：           ABT 2.5 MTS VLSFO  + 0.1 MTS LSMGO PER DAY

WORKING：ABT 4.5 MTS VLSFO  + 0.1MTS LSMGO  PER DAY

ADDITIONAL ABT 4.5 MT VLSFO DAILY FOR BALLAST/DEBALLAST

ADDITIONAL ABT 1.5 MT VLSFO DAILY FOR BOILER CONSUMPTION WITH TEMPERATURE LESS THAN 10 DEGREE CENTIGRADE.

 

(A) AVERAGE SPEED AND AVERAGE CONSUMPTION TO BE CALCULATED FROM SEA BUOY TO SEA BUOY EXCLUDING PERIODS OF SLOW STEAMING

ON CHARTERERS ORDER OR FOR REASONS OF SAFETY OR STANDING BY OR ASSISTING ANOTHER VESSEL IN DISTRESS.

(B) SPEED AND CONSUMPTION BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS OF UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (SIGNIFICANT HEIGHT MAX 1.25M)WITH NO NEGATIVE SWELL NO ADVERSE CURRENTS, MINIMUM 24 HOURS STEAMING TIME, MAX SEA SURFACE TEMPERATURE OF 26 DEGREES CELCIUS, EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WE ATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED.

(C)VESL MAY BURN SMALL QTYS OF LSMGO WHEN MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW&NARROW WATERS ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS/IN HEAVY WEATHER/CANAL/RIVER/BALLAST/DEBALLAST ETC.

(D) 0.5 KNOT ALLOWANCE  TO BE APPLIED FOR SPEED ASSESSMENT, 5% ALLOWANCE FOR OWNER TO BE APPLIED TO BUNKER CONSUMPTION.

(E) BUNKER SAVING TO OFFSET ANY TIME LOST AND VICE VERSA.

(F) BUNKER SUPPLIED BEING OF ISO8217:2017 (E)  SPECIFICATION, OR 2010, IF 2017 IS NOT AVAILABLE

= ALL DETAILS ABOUT= 


Tks n B.rgs
